lead_paragraph: Morgan Hamm’s petition to the United States championships was approved, keeping alive his quest to make a third Olympic squad. Hamm dropped out of a qualifying meet Wednesday because of an allergic reaction that made breathing difficult. His withdrawal forced him to file a petition to gain a spot in next month’s nationals.
